snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes questions about why students take phone photos in class, common search queries about the presidential candidates...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes questions about why students take phone photos in class, common search queries about the presidential candidates and a look at corporation getting hacked and how much they tell anyone.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Coca-Cola Hacking, and Class Photos
